1: וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>went</n> אִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>a man</n> מִבֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> לֵוִ֑י <sup>3878 </sup> <n>of Levi</n> וַיִּקַּ֖ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and took</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בַּת־ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>[to wife] a daughter</n> לֵוִֽי׃ <sup>3878 </sup> <n>of Levi</n>

3: וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יָכְלָ֣ה <sup>3201 </sup> <n>And when she could</n> עוֹד֮ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>not longer</n> הַצְּפִינוֹ֒ <sup>6845 </sup> <n>hide</n> וַתִּֽקַּֽח־ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>him she took</n> לוֹ֙ תֵּ֣בַת <sup>8392 </sup> <n>for him an ark</n> גֹּ֔מֶא <sup>1573 </sup> <n>of bulrushes</n> וַתַּחְמְרָ֥ה <sup>2560 </sup> <n>and daubed</n> בַחֵמָ֖ר <sup>2564 </sup> <n>it with slime</n> וּבַזָּ֑פֶת <sup>2203 </sup> <n>and with pitch</n> וַתָּ֤שֶׂם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and put</n> בָּהּ֙ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַיֶּ֔לֶד <sup>3206 </sup> <n>the child</n> וַתָּ֥שֶׂם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>therein and she laid</n> בַּסּ֖וּף <sup>5488 </sup> <n>[it] in the flags</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>by</n> שְׂפַ֥ת <sup>8193 </sup> <n>brink</n> הַיְאֹֽר׃ <sup>2975 </sup> <n>by the river's</n>
